General.Name: Beijing Jingyeda Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Jingyeda Technology Co.,Ltd. provides system integration services. The company engages in the development, application, and service of industry information systems. It offers IT information consulting services in the areas of business design, system planning, solutions, engineering implementation, custom development, operation and maintenance, etc.; and educational training services. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Beijing, China.
